about_the_game:
Gear up for Non-Stop Action

Join the action-packed world of Nearly Friendly Tribes (NFT), the low-poly First-Person Shooter by Block Bastards. Battle it out in beautifully designed arenas, armed with Interoperable weapons. Are you ready to dominate the competition?

  • Use your own Interoperable Weapons — Elevate your gaming experience with Nearly Friendly Tribes. Unlock powerful weapons and bring them for a competitive edge like never before. With seamless interoperability, you can dominate in Nearly Friendly Tribes and beyond. So why settle for a standard arsenal? Bring your own weapons and emerge victorious.



  • Explore all the different Tribes — Embrace the diverse cultures of the Rapper Tribe, the soulful Blues Tribe, the electrifying Metal Tribe, the laid-back Country Tribe and much more. Each tribe brings its own unique flair to the battlefield, offering distinct playstyles and aesthetics that will resonate with every gamer's preferences.

  • Challenge your friends in different Game Modes — Experience the thrill of strategic teamwork and precision aiming in Capture the Flag. Dominate the battlefield alongside your squad in Team Deathmatch and test your individual mettle in Free-For-All battles!

  • Defend your Tribe in all the different maps — Battle across a variety of maps, from the bustling parking lot to the lively festival map and the gritty docks in Shipyard, testing your mettle. Adapt, outsmart, and defend your tribe to victory!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 7th gen / AMD Ryzen 3000 series or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA / AMD Graphics Card with 2GB RAM or greater
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8th gen / AMD Ryzen 5000 series or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA / AMD Graphics Card with 6GB RAM or greater
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
